meanings.definition: A person who settles in a new colony or moves into new country.
meanings.sent1: The brave colonist traveled far to start a new life in the colony.
meanings.sent2: The colonist built a house in the new land.
meanings.sent3: The colonist tried to plant a flag in the moon's soil, thinking it was a new colony.
meanings.sent4: She was a colonist of change, always seeking new beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The colonist's journey was filled with hope and uncertainty.

meanings.definition: A member of a group of people who establish a colony.
meanings.sent1: The colonist worked together with others to build the settlement.
meanings.sent2: The colonist community celebrated their successful harvest.
meanings.sent3: The colonist group had a potluck to welcome the newest member.
meanings.sent4: He was a loyal colonist, always putting the needs of the group first.
meanings.sent5: The colonist team was like a family, supporting each other through thick and thin.
